ygData.subject: Re: How Lullaby used to be. (Results on how it is now)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hahhahahha. Too funny. They ve also just announced they discovered a sign error in damage shield stacking as well. I wonder how many other ones are lurking
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Feb 04/00, kim@... wrote:

>
> I'm going to run these tests a couple more times (against a
> snake this time after I've been sprayed by skunk musk). But
> it's *really* looking like there's a sign error for the
> charisma enhancement on Lullaby. With 80 charisma, for the
> first time I was getting secondary resist rates nearly as low
> as the 25% GZ was claiming we should get.


Hahhahahha. Too funny. They've also just announced they discovered a
sign error in damage shield stacking as well. I wonder how many other
ones are lurking about in the code causing the inexplicable problems
people notice.

In the meantime, time to swap out the guise for grotesque, take off
the white gold necklace and dig the ugly stick back out of the bank.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
